pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, December 5, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Monday, December 5, 2016:

Ottawa, Ontario

2:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the Hour of Code and will deliver brief remarks.

Shopify
150 Elgin Street       
6th floor
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity
  • Open coverage for remarks
  • Media should arrive no later than 1:45 p.m.


Media appearance

CBC Radio One Metro Morning with Matt Galloway - In the context of the first anniversary of the first wave of Syrian refugees arriving to Canada, a roundtable discussion with the Prime Minister will air in three segments at 6:10 a.m., 7:10 a.m. and 8:10 a.m.


PMO Media Relations:
media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
